tool_description: Automatically categorizes reviews into product aspects, topics, or themes using natural language processing and classification models.

review_texts.description: Array of review text content for categorization

category_system.description: Categorization approach: aspects, topics, themes, or custom

custom_categories.description: Custom category labels when using custom category system

max_categories_per_review.description: Maximum number of categories per review (1-10)

error_messages: Invalid review_texts: Input must be a non-empty array of text strings. Ensure review content is available for categorization.
Unsupported category_system: Use one of [aspects, topics, themes, custom]. Each system uses different classification approaches.
Missing custom_categories: When using 'custom' category_system, must provide custom_categories array with at least 2 categories.
Confidence threshold out of range: min_confidence must be between 0.1 and 1.0. Lower values include more uncertain classifications.
Invalid max_categories limit: Value must be between 1 and 10. Higher values may produce too many overlapping categories.
usage: Provide review_texts array and select category_system. For custom categorization, provide custom_categories array. Configure confidence and limit parameters as needed.

review_categories.description: Primary categories assigned to each review

category_confidence.description: Confidence scores for primary category assignments

all_categories.description: All categories found across all reviews

uncategorized_count.description: Number of reviews that couldn't be categorized with sufficient confidence
